directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C). In a saucepan over medium high heat, combine chicken, barbeque sauce, honey, molasses, brown sugar and cilantro. Bring to a boil.
Spread chicken mixture evenly over pizza crust, and top with cheese and onions.  Bake for 15 to 20 minutes, or until cheese is melted.
ingredients: 3 boneless chicken breast halves, cooked and cubed
title: BBQ Chicken Pizza I
